title: HiContactsData
text: HiContactsData companion data package giving programmatic access several processed Hi-C files demonstration, cool, mcool pairs files. meant used HiContacts. function provided HiContactsData package HiContactsData(). Several files avaible using function, namely: S288C.cool (sample: yeast_wt, format = cool) S288C.mcool (sample: yeast_wt, format = mcool) S288C.pairs.gz chrII (sample: yeast_wt, format = pairs) S288C_Eco1-AID.mcool (sample: yeast_Eco1, format = mcool) S288C_Eco1-AID.pairs.gz chrII (sample: yeast_Eco1, format = pairs) mESCs.mcool (sample: mESCs, format = mcool) mESCs.pairs.gz chr13 (sample: mESCs, format = pairs) Yeast data comes Bastie, Chapard et al., Nature Structural & Molecular Biology 2022 mouse ESC data comes Bonev et al., Cell 2017. download one files, one can specify sample file format:
code: library(HiContactsData) cool_file <- HiContactsData() #> Available files: #>       sample   format genome    condition                              notes #> 1   yeast_wt     cool  S288C    wild-type      cool file @ resolution of 1kb #> 2   yeast_wt    mcool  S288C    wild-type               multi-res mcool file #> 3   yeast_wt pairs.gz  S288C    wild-type only pairs from chrII are provided #> 4 yeast_eco1    mcool  S288C Eco1-AID+IAA               multi-res mcool file #> 5 yeast_eco1 pairs.gz  S288C Eco1-AID+IAA only pairs from chrII are provided #> 6      mESCs    mcool   mm10        mESCs               multi-res mcool file #> 7      mESCs pairs.gz   mm10        mESCs only pairs from chr13 are provided #>     EHID #> 1 EH7701 #> 2 EH7702 #> 3 EH7703 #> 4 EH7704 #> 5 EH7705 #> 6 EH7706 #> 7 EH7707 #>  cool_file <- HiContactsData(sample = 'yeast_wt', format = 'cool') #> snapshotDate(): 2022-08-23 #> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation #> loading from cache cool_file #>                                                 EH7701  #> "/github/home/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/4be4191a670_7751"

title: HiContactsData
text: HiContacts package can used import data provided HiContactsData. Refer HiContacts package documentation information.

title: HiContacts companion data package
text: HiContactsData companion data package giving programmatic access several processed Hi-C files demonstration, cool, mcool pairs files. meant used HiContacts. function provided HiContactsData package HiContactsData(). Several files avaible using function, namely: S288C.cool (sample: yeast_wt, format = cool) S288C.mcool (sample: yeast_wt, format = mcool) S288C.pairs.gz chrII (sample: yeast_wt, format = pairs) S288C_Eco1-AID.mcool (sample: yeast_Eco1, format = mcool) S288C_Eco1-AID.pairs.gz chrII (sample: yeast_Eco1, format = pairs) mESCs.mcool (sample: mESCs, format = mcool) mESCs.pairs.gz chr13 (sample: mESCs, format = pairs)

title: HiContactsData — HiContactsData
text: Downloads different types Hi-C processed files (cool, mcool, pairs.gz) returns path cached file.

title: HiContactsData — HiContactsData
text: Local path queried file cached BiocFileCache.
